Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:JRAMPERSAD::EXPONENTIAL::Function< lrgst_expo >
A class representing an Exponential Function (e.g 2x^2 + 4x - 1), JRAMPERSAD::EXPONENTIAL::GA_Options
Structure for options to be used when running one of the two genetic algorithms in a Function object
